whoIs.title: Who`s David?
whoIs.description: Hey there, I'm David. I love working in IT because coding feels like solving exciting puzzles every day. I'm passionate about creating smart and efficient solutions that really make a difference. My inspiration comes from the endless opportunities to learn and improve, whether through new technologies or complex challenges. Every problem I tackle teaches me something new and drives me to find the most elegant and powerful way to solve it.

stack.title: Skill set
stack.description: I am a dedicated frontend developer with a passion for modern web technologies. Eager to learn and adaptable, I approach new challenges with enthusiasm. See for yourself what I can do!
stack.stickerPeeled: Also, im interested in diving into:

myWork.title: Projects
myWork.description: Here you will find a curated selection of my projects – each one a result of my passion for web development, creativity, and problem-solving. These projects represent my journey of learning, growing, and turning ideas into real, impactful applications.
myWork.projectDescription1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
myWork.projectDescription2: Willy the Wizard is a dark 2D action-adventure that draws players into a forgotten, perilous world. As the young wizard Willy, you must master ancient magic, defeat sinister creatures, and uncover your fate in a crumbling land full of secrets. Challenging gameplay, atmospheric pixel art, and a melancholic story define Willy’s journey into the unknown.
myWork.projectDescription3: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

contactForm.title: Ready to work together?
contactForm.description: I`m always open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you have a project in mind or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
contactForm.name: What´s your name?
contactForm.privacyTextBottom: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

testimonial.title: Colleagues` Thoughts
testimonial.description1: David brings not only technical expertise but also a real sense for design and user experience. I'm looking forward to more projects with him!
testimonial.description2: Even during stressful phases, David stays calm and always finds pragmatic solutions. His positive attitude makes working together very enjoyable.
testimonial.description3: Working with David was always straightforward and professional. His creativity and quick understanding greatly enriched our project.

As the young wizard Willy, you must master ancient magic, defeat sinister creatures, and uncover your fate in a crumbling land full of secrets. Challenging gameplay, atmospheric pixel art, and a melancholic story define Willy’s journey into the unknown.
